title: Ticket #2457: Learn how to use Galaxy with Condor
description:
"Galaxy is an open, web-based platform for data intensive biomedical research. Whether on this free public server or your own instance, you can perform, reproduce, and share complete analyses."

We have at least one engagement where Galaxy is important. There will probably be more in the future. We should build up some expertise with it. Web page is Galaxy.
creator: nwp
